Initializer# init(name:matrixFloat4x4:)

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
init(
    name: String,
    matrixFloat4x4 value: matrix_float4x4
)
```
